data.description: fetch info about installed rpm - packages
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Hello,

    I choosed the RPM namespace, because the modules use is to fetch
    informations about installed rpms.

    The module should be placed in the module list, because I think
    that it is quite useful - especially by using it for getting
    information about more than one rpm.
